entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then rain showers and flurries beginning late this afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
